value:
$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Hnnn... Ugh...$k$pSo dark... Where is everyone?
I don't like this... I'm scared...$k$pNo... No! Ice dragons! Fire dragons!
What are you doing? This is a human
village! People live here! Stop it!$k$pCan't move... Why can't I move?
I need to stop them... Why won't
they listen to me?$k$pIf this keeps up, I... No! I can't...
If I change, I'll become a monster
just like the other dragons!$k$pI don't want that! Stop it, please!
Ban-Ban! Mar-Mar! Help me!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_開花チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Bloom01,Face|$Fi1500|I don't want to be a monster! I don't
want to be a monster! I DON'T WANT
TO BE A MONSTER!$k$pHngh... Ahh... Where am I? Is it...
morning? Was I sleeping? Oh,
what an awful nightmare!$k$pIt's been so long. I was sure those
bad dreams were gone forever...$k$pBut now that I'm in Askr, it looks
like I'm having them again. Will
they ever stop?$k$pWhat if they're a sign? What if they
come true? I don't know...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ハーディン,ch01_29_Hardin_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|I see. So you expect the summoner
to be away on duty for some time.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|A few days at most. Are you able to
wait that long, or do you require
$Nu urgently?$k$p$WmMPID_ハーディン,ch01_29_Hardin_M_Normal,Face|I will wait, if I must, but I have no
desire to tarry. This matter concerns
more than merely myself.$k$pYou will recall that I, Princess Nyna,
and Princess Elice were summoned
around the same time.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I do recall that, yes. So your request
has something to do with them?$k$p$WmMPID_ハーディン,ch01_29_Hardin_M_Normal,Face|Indeed. You and the Order of Heroes
have no doubt worked frequently
with royalty of other worlds.$k$pNyna is the sole survivor of House
Archanea. Elice is the eldest princess
of Altea and has the blood of Anri.$k$pEach is a powerful symbol of her
country. They are inspirations to their
people—not common soldiers.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I am not certain I follow. What is your
request, exactly?$k$p$WmMPID_ハーディン,ch01_29_Hardin_M_Normal,Face|To return these princesses whence
they came. They are not meant for
Askran battlefields.$k$p
